page.title: 11CLWYD VALE LIFE STYLE CHANGE
page.content: {Social atmosphere:_}Some small cottages have been sold as{second {homes}or to people retiring to the area resulting in a change in the social atmosphere of the area.There are a substantial number of people who {commute}to employment outside the area -banker ,doctor,salesman,workers in creamery.Where an owner occupied farm can only support one family, the son may work outside the area,but expect to return in time.Buildings: There is a trend towards converting farm buildings into houses.These buildings have become obsolete because of changes in farming methods.{Chidhood}:One lady who spent her childhood in the area & now lives with her own children in the area felt that it is too risky to allow them to roam the hills as she had done as a child.
